newsitem.title: TAIWAN: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - June 5.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - June 5.

text.p: These are the leading stories in the Taiwan press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
CHINA TIMES - Nationalist, Democratic Progressive parties sign agreement to cooperate in amending constitution
Floods wreak havoc to central, southern Taiwan, one killed, two missing
UNITED DAILY NEWS - Democratic Progressive Party faces imminent split due to internal rift over constitutional amendments, opponents demand resignation of party chief
Fifty-thousand attend candlelight vigil in Hong Kong in memory of victims of 1989 crackdown at Beijing's Tiananmen
LIBERTY TIMES - National Science Council issues white paper on state plan to develop Taiwan into technology centre
COMMERCIAL TIMES - Cabinet to review proposal on imposing 10 percent tax on retained surplus gains
Economic and trade activities to be axis of future Taiwan, Hong Kong relations
ECONOMIC DAILY NEWS - Chinese Petroleum, Taiwan Sugar plan selloff of all their China Petrochemical shares
Bank of Taiwan reduces interest rates on long-term time deposits
